Metadata.title: Hi-Care
Metadata.description: Hi-Care is a leading digital health platform offering medical insurance, instant doctor chats, and easy appointment booking.
Metadata.keywords: medical insurance, online doctor, telehealth, health coverage, Hi-Care

Welcome.title: Your Health, Our Priority
Welcome.description: Experience a new era of personalized healthcare. Connect with top doctors, manage your medical records, and take control of your wellness journey today

About.title: We Care About Your Health
About.subtitle: Hi-Care is your trusted digital destination for integrated healthcare.
About.missionText: To provide fast and easy access to healthcare and medical insurance for everyone using the latest technology.
About.visionText: To be the leading platform in the Middle East connecting patients with top doctors and insurance providers.

features.doctorsText: A selection of the best doctors across all medical specialties.
features.insuranceText: Manage your medical insurance approvals digitally and effortlessly.
features.supportText: A dedicated support team to assist you anytime, 24/7.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We are here to help and answer your medical inquiries at any time.

Signup.insuranceSubtitle: Choose your provider to filter doctor searches later.
Signup.termsText: By clicking accept, you authorize Hi-Care to share your insurance details with medical providers to facilitate appointment booking.
Signup.agree: I agree to the terms of service and data processing policy.
